item.description:
Co-creator of The Daily Show and co-founder of Air America Radio, political satirist Lizz Winstead is hitting the road in support of Planned Parenthood with her “Planned Parenthood, I Am Here for You” tour!

Throughout July and culminating with a final show in September, Winstead will be taking her razor-sharp wit and hilarious spin on current events to seven cities in five states, with all proceeds going to benefit local Planned Parenthood health centers. She was inspired to develop the tour by her long-standing support of Planned Parenthood’s work.

Check out Lizz's video vault on Comedy Central here.

Look for the Pink T-Shirts outside Coolidge Corner Theater at 6:30pm.

Tickets available online here.

It's possible that this will sell out, so definitely get your tickets before you come!

Contact us with any questions! Can't wait to see you all there!

-Meg Davis and the PPLM Events Team
item.name: The Daily Show co-creator Lizz Winstead LIVE to support PPLM!
